news.title: Shindo Client Release.
news.Author: MikiDevAHM
news.subtitle: we have released ShindoClient.
news.body: Today we are happy to say we have finaly released ShindoClient into public beta, with this we expect there to be bugs however we have tried to ensure that the client is usable. We are looking forward to hearing user reactions to the glide beta and want to thank for using Glide.

news.title: The new news section.
news.Author: ShindoClient
news.subtitle: The news from Shindo.
news.body: We are testing the new news feature, here we will send announcements you can see straight from the client to stay updated about what we are working on!
